pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, May 14, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Annual Meeting of the Union des municipalités du Québec.

 Note for media:

  • Media interested in watching the event live can contact plemieux@umq.qc.ca for details.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually visit the Thunder Bay Alstom plant. He will be joined by Member of Parliament for Thunder Bay—Rainy River Marcus Powlowski, Minister of Health and Member of Parliament for Thunder Bay—Superior North Patty Hajdu, Thunder Bay Mayor Bill Mauro, and Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Catherine McKenna.

Closed to media.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Christchurch Call Second Anniversary virtual leaders’ Summit, co-chaired by the President of France, Emmanuel Macron, and the Prime Minister of New Zealand, Jacinda Ardern.

Closed to media.
